channel.title: [508] Dragon 2h Help [508]
channel.description: Well for making a Weapons special you need a gfx right. I was wondering if you can change the move of the special if you change the gfx into a emote. To make thing simpler The GFX to show the weapons special be able to change into an emote because the Dragon 2h sword doesnt have a gfx id for 508 server. Is it possible to change the special's look if you make the GFXid into a Emote id instead.
